Text:
This download did not run for me. UTorrent downloaded it and the burn was verified 100%. yet no media player nor virtual player will play past the menu screen. 

Sorry BL, this file and Vol #1 both appear corrupt on this end. It even took me 4 DVDs before Nero could verify a single good dvd burn of Vol #1. 

DO NOT DOWNLOAD! AVOID! -Sorry BL.
